quote: Beauty is truth, truth beauty, that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.
author: John Keats

quote: Beauty is a matter of size and order.
author: Aristotle

quote: Beauty is no quality in things themselves: It exists merely in the mind which contemplates them.
author: David Hume

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: To feel beauty is a better thing than to understand how we come to feel it.
author: George Santayana

quote: Art is essentially the affirmation, the blessing, and the deification of existence.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Beauty is the harmony of purpose and form.
author: Alvar Aalto

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
author: Aristotle

quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The beauty of life is in small details, not in big events.
author: Jim Jarmusch

quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Beauty lies not in objects, but in the interaction between the shadow and light created by objects.
author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quote: The highest form of beauty is that which reveals all inner mysteries.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The beauty of the universe consists not only of unity in variety, but also of variety in unity.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode, but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
author: John Ray

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The beauty of the world lies in the diversity of its people.
author: Unknown

quote: Beauty is about enhancing what you have. Let yourself shine through.
author: Janelle Monae

quote: There is no exquisite beauty without some strangeness in the proportion.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Scientists study nature not because it is useful, but because it is beautiful.
author: Henri Poincaré

quote: My work always tries to unite the true with the beautiful; but when I had to choose one or the other, I usually chose the beautiful.
author: Hermann Weyl

quote: I am among those who think that science has great beauty.
author: Marie Curie

quote: No matter how beautiful a theory is, if it doesn't agree with experiment, it is wrong.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Mathematics, rightly viewed, possesses not only truth, but supreme beauty.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: In nature, beauty is not ornamental but functional.
author: Peter Atkins

quote: The scientist does not study nature because it is useful; he studies it because he delights in it.
author: Jules Henri Poincaré

quote: The earth does not belong to us; we belong to the earth.
author: Chief Seattle

quote: When all the trees have been cut down, when all the animals have been hunted, when all the waters are polluted, when all the air is unsafe to breathe, only then will you discover you cannot eat money.
author: Cree Prophecy

quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: Navajo Proverb

quote: Walk in beauty. Live in harmony.
author: Navajo Teaching

quote: Everything on the earth has a purpose, every disease an herb to cure it, and every person a mission.
author: Mourning Dove Salish

quote: The beauty of the trees, the softness of the air, the fragrance of the grass speaks to me.
author: Chief Dan George

quote: When you were born, you cried and the world rejoiced. Live your life so that when you die, the world cries and you rejoice.
author: Cherokee Proverb

quote: All things share the same breath - the beast, the tree, the man.
author: Chief Seattle

quote: The beauty of living things lies in the patterns of their growth.
author: Aboriginal Proverb

quote: We are all connected to everything and everyone.
author: Indigenous Teaching

quote: God is beautiful and loves beauty.
author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (peace be upon him)

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder.
author: Arabic Proverb

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Beauty surrounds us, but usually we need to be walking in a garden to know it.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: The beauty of the heart is the lasting beauty.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Beauty is not a need but an ecstasy.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The beauty myth moves for men as a mirage; its power lies in its ever-receding nature.
author: Naomi Wolf

quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I'm not interested in being perfect when I'm older. I'm interested in having a narrative.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: There is no force more powerful than a woman determined to rise.
author: W.E.B. Dubois

quote: The most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
author: Beyoncé

quote: Your self-worth is determined by you. You don't have to depend on someone telling you who you are.
author: Beyoncé

quote: Pretty is not the rent you pay to exist in the world as a woman.
author: Erin McKean

quote: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries, or the way she combs her hair.
author: Maya Angelou
